byline.contributor: Neil Gough and Chris Buckley contributed reporting.

abstract: Volatile two days of trading in United States stock market, with most extreme price fluctuations seen since financial crisis, increases uncertainty among investors about global markets as initial rebound leads to further decline; US economy remains strong, but many express concern that Federal Reserve plans to raise interest rates could change that.
lead_paragraph: A strong rally on Wall Street faded rapidly on Tuesday afternoon, killing hopes for an end to the recent turmoil in the markets.

headline.main: Stocks Deepen Their Slide After Early Gains Evaporate
headline.print_headline: Stocks Deepen Their Slide After a Rebound Collapses

snippet: A strong rally on Wall Street faded rapidly on Tuesday afternoon, killing hopes for an end to the recent turmoil in the markets.
